metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14847 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in samba 4.0.0 before samba 4.9.15 and samba 4.10.x before 4.10.10. An attacker can crash AD DC LDAP server via dirsync resulting in denial of service. Privilege escalation is not possible with this issue.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14847` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ctdb - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.23
libnss-winbind - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.23
libpam-winbind - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.23
libparse-pidl-perl - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.23
libsmbclient - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.23
libwbclient0 - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.23
python-samba - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.23
registry-tools - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.23
samba - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.23
samba-common - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.23
samba-common-bin - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.23
samba-dsdb-modules - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.23
samba-libs - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.23
samba-testsuite - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.23
samba-vfs-modules - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.23
smbclient - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.23
winbind - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.23
No subscription required

criterions.comment: samba package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.23').
